text: Wilton Lewis Felder (August 31, 1940 - September 27, 2015) was an American jazz musician. He played the saxophone and bass. He is best known as a founding member of The Jazz Crusaders, later known as The Crusaders. He was born in Houston, Texas. Felder died of multiple myeloma on September 27, 2015 in Whittier, California. He was 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American bass guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American saxophonists Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Musicians from Houston
title: Wilton Felder
